name: OR_LOG_PREOPDX
description: The OR_LOG_PREOPDX table contains OR management system log preop diagnoses.

columns.name: LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the log record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The number of the line of the pre-op diagnosis information for the log.

columns.name: PRE_OP_DIAG
columns.description: The pre-op diagnosis of the log.
